<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flying Blade](/Feats.aspx?ID=6130) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 163 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
precise strike

</column>

---

You apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks. You apply your precise strike damage on ranged Strikes you make with a thrown weapon within that weapon's first range increment. The thrown weapon must be an agile or finesse weapon. This also allows you to make a thrown weapon ranged Strike for [Confident Finisher](/Actions.aspx?ID=2818) and any other [finisher](/Traits.aspx?ID=802) that includes a Strike that can benefit from your precise strike.

<title level="2">Flying Blade leads to...</title>
[Twirling Throw](/Feats.aspx?ID=6151)
name: Flying Blade
